Translations.Text: Ani amhi musavara vahayi (prakasana) keli ki ratricya ratri majhya dasanna ghe'una nigha. Tumha sarvanca pathalaga kela ja'ila
Phira'aunane saharammadhye jama karanaryanna pathavile
Ki niscitaca ha samuha atisaya kami sankhyeta ahe
Ani tyavara he amhala phara krodhita karita aheta
Ani nihsansaya, amhi mothya sankhyeta ahota, tyancyapasuna savadha rahanare
Sevati amhi tyanna bagammadhuna va jharyammadhuna bahera kadhale
Ani khajin'yammadhuna ani cangalya cangalya thikanammadhuna
Asa prakare jhale, ani amhi tya (sarva vastum) ca varasa isra'ilacya santatila banavile
Yastava phira'aunace anuyayi surya ugavataca tyanca pathalaga karanyasa nighale
Yasathi jevha doghanni ekamekanna pahile tevha musace sathidara mhanale, amhi tara khatrine pakadita alo
(Hajarata musa) mhanale, kadapi nahi. Visvasa rakha, majha raba (palanakarta) majhya sobatila ahe. Jo jarura mala marga dakhavila
Amhi musakade vahayi (prakasana) pathavili ki samudracya panyavara apalya kathica prahara kara tevha tyaca ksani samudra dubhangala ani pratyeka his'sa panyacya mothya parvata'itaka jhala
Ani amhi tyaca thikani dusaryanna javala anuna ubhe kele
Ani musa ani tyancya sarva sathidaranna mukti pradana keli
Maga itara sarvanna budavuna takale
Nihsansaya, yata phara motha bodha ahe ani tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka imana rakhanare nahita
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta motha varcasvasali ani daya karanara ahe
Ani tyanna ibrahimaca vrttantahi aikava
Jevha tyanni apalya pityasa ani apalya janasamuhacya lokanna pharmavile ki tumhi konaci upasana karata
Tyanni uttara dile ki amhi murtinci upasana karato. Amhi tara satata tyance upasaka banuna basalo ahota
Paigambara (ibrahima alai.) Yanni vicarale, jevha tumhi yanna pukarata tevha kaya te aikatatahi
Kinva tumhala napha - nukasanahi pohacavu sakatata
Te mhanale, he (sarva amhi nahi janata) amhala tara amace purvaja aseca karatana adhalale aheta
(Ibrahima) mhanale, tyanna kahi janata, jyanci tumhi puja karita ahata
Tumhi ani tumacya purvice vadavadila
Te sarva majhe satru aheta, tya sacca allahakherija, jo sarva visvaca palanakarta ahe
Jyane mala nirmana kele ani toca mala margadarsana karato
Toca ahe jo mala kha'u-pi'u ghalato
Taseca jevha mi ajari padato tevha to mala svasthya pradana karato
Ani toca mala mrtyu de'ila ani maga punha jivanta karila
Ani jyacyakaduna asa balagato ki to mobadala dila janyacya divasi majhe aparadha mapha karila
He majhya palanakartya! Mala hikamata (bud'dhi kausalya) pradana kara ani mala neka- sadacari lokammadhye samila kara
Ani majhe pavitra - smarana (bhavisyata) yenarya lokammadhyehi baki theva
Ani mala sukhanni bharalelya jannatacya varasampaiki banava
Ani majhya pityasa ksama kara. Nihsansaya to margabhrasta lokampaiki hota
Ani jya divasi loka dusaryanda jivanta kele jatila, mala apamanita karu nakosa
Jya divasi dhana-sampatti ani santati kahica upayogi padanara nahi
Parantu (labhanvita toca tharela) jo allahasamora vyangavirahita hrdaya ne'ila
Ani neka sadacari lokankarita jannatala agadi javala anale ja'ila
Ani margabhrasta lokankarita jahannama ughada keli ja'ila
Ani tyanna vicarale ja'ila ki tumhi jyanci upasana karita rahile, te kothe aheta
Je sarvasrestha allahakherijace hote. Kaya he tumaci madata karatata kinva ekhada badala ghe'u sakatata
Yastava te sarva ani samasta margabhrasta loka jahannamamadhye vara khali phekale jatila
Ani iblisa (saitana) ce sampurna sain'yahi
Tithe te apasata bhandana - tanta karita mhanatila
Allahaci sapatha! Nihsansaya, amhi tara ughata asa cukinvara hoto
Vastavika tumhala sarva visvacya palanakartyasamana samajata hoto
Ani amhala tara gunhegarankherija itara konihi margabhrasta kele navhate
Ata tara amaci koni sipharasa karanarahi nahi
Ani na ekhada (sacca) hitacintaka mitra
Jara amhala eka vela dusaryanda janyaci sandhi labhali asati tara amhi pakke sacce imanadharaka banalo asato
Nihsansaya, yata eka phara mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahuteka loka imana rakhanare nahita
Ani nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Nuhacya janasamuhanehi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha tyanca bha'u nuha yanni sangitale, kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi rakhata
(Aika!) Mi tumacyakade allahaca visvasta rasula (paigambara) ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya balagale pahije ani majhe mhanane man'ya kele pahije
Ani mi tumacyakaduna tyabaddala konatahi mobadala icchita nahi. Majha mobadala tara kevala sarva visvanca palanakartyajavala ahe
Yastava tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
